response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, we believe its fair market value exceeds $12,000. We're offering you this opportunity to own it at an exclusive price of $15,000.
